red.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
red.description: A bold, full-bodied wine with flavors of blackcurrant and cedar.

red.name: Pinot Noir
red.description: A delicate, medium-bodied wine with flavors of red cherry and earthy undertones.

red.name: Malbec
red.description: A rich, full-bodied wine with flavors of blackberry and plum.

white.name: Chardonnay
white.description: A rich, buttery wine with notes of vanilla and tropical fruit.

white.name: Sauvignon Blanc
white.description: A crisp, refreshing wine with flavors of citrus and green apple.

white.name: Riesling
white.description: A light, aromatic wine with flavors of peach and apricot.

sparkling.name: Champagne
sparkling.description: A classic, elegant sparkling wine with a fine mousse and flavors of apple and brioche.

sparkling.name: Prosecco
sparkling.description: A light and fruity sparkling wine with aromas of peach and pear.

sparkling.name: Cava
sparkling.description: A dry, crisp sparkling wine with flavors of green apple and citrus.
